title: ClientPreferences
description: User preferences stored at .mcp-client-data/preferences.json. Controls tool states, timeouts, and iteration limits.

toolStates.description: Per-tool enable/disable state. Key is full tool name (server__tool), value is boolean.

promptStates.description: Per-prompt enable/disable state. Key is full prompt name (server__prompt), value is boolean.

mcpTimeout.description: MCP tool call timeout in seconds. -1 for unlimited.

maxIterations.description: Maximum iterations between agent calls. -1 for unlimited.

hilEnabled.description: Human-in-the-loop mode: require approval before tool execution
